result.reason: The fullscreen resolution calculation in RdpProtocol.cs incorrectly uses the Main Window's DPI and bounds, which causes incorrect resolution (understated/blurry) when the connection is displayed on a different monitor with different DPI/scaling settings.
result.approach: Update SetResolution in RdpProtocol.cs to use the screen and DPI of the actual connection control (AxHost) or the target monitor, ensuring the physical resolution is calculated correctly for mixed-DPI environments.
